An error occurred while saving your chan: Hitilafu ilitokea wakati wa kuhifadhi mabadiliko yako. Tafadhali jaribu tena. Tatizo likiendelea, huenda ukahitaji kusasisha faili wewe mwenyewe kupitia FTP.
There is %s error which must be fixed be: Kuna hitilafu %s linalofaa kurekebishwa kabla uboreshe faili hii.
Kuna hitilafu %s zinazofaa kurekebishwa kabla uboreshe faili hii.
The changes you made will be lost if you: Mabadiliko uliyoyafanya yatapotea ukiondoka kwenye nakala hii.
